atk-abh03a10:2_6: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti seyyathāpi sammitiyā,
atk-abh03a10:2_7: te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa. ‘‘Tīhi,
atk-abh03a10:2_9: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṁse.
atk-abh03a10:2_12: 9.21) idaṁ suttaṁ nissāya dvepi brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_13: Puna dvinnampi brahmacariyānaṁ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:2_14: Tattha hatthasaṁvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro.
atk-abh03a10:2_17: Paṭiññāya adhippāyaṁ asallakkhetvā pabbajjāvasena anuyogo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a10:3_0: 270.Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṁ maggapaṭilābhaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:3_1: Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a10:3_3: Puna ‘‘atthi devesū’’ti pañhepi maggabhāvanaṁ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a10:5_0: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā,
atk-abh03a10:5_2: yattha atthīti evaṁ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṁ sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:6_1: Suttānuyoge kuhiṁ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:7_2: yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-abh03a10:9_1: Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti,
atk-abh03a10:9_2: sotāpannādīnampi siyāti etamatthaṁ dassetuṁ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṁ saṁsandanapucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a10:9_5: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a10:9_6: So idha anāgāmimaggaṁ bhāvetvā ‘‘opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī’’ti vacanato ‘‘puna maggabhāvanaṁ vinā upapattivaseneva
atk-abh03a10:9_8: Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṁ bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṁ idhāgamanaññeva natthi.
atk-abh03a10:9_9: Iti so anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyaṁ puṭṭho paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a10:10_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe ‘‘anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva natthī’’ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:10_2: na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā sakavādissa ,
atk-abh03a10:10_4: Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma jāto.
atk-abh03a10:11_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe ‘‘opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī’’ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a10:11_1: Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato vaseneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:12_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṁ vaseneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a10:12_1: Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena tassa akuppapaṭivedhaṁ icchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a10:13_0: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṁ udāharaṇaṁ paravādissa, dutiyaṁ sakavādissa. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a10:16_2: Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṁ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṁ
atk-abh03a10:16_4: tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa,
